TEXT.English: Bored of your monotonous life? Ready for adventures? Safari hunters bring to you the excitement of rediscovering the real man inside you. Are you good enough to hunt elephants, deers, bears or even whales in their natural habitats? Come with us and try... you can keep your trophies!
TEXT.French: Bored of your monotonous life? Ready for adventures? Safari hunters bring to you the excitement of rediscovering the real man inside you. Are you good enough to hunt elephants, deers, bears or even whales in their natural habitats? Come with us and try... you can keep your trophies!
TEXT.German: Bored of your monotonous life? Ready for adventures? Safari hunters bring to you the excitement of rediscovering the real man inside you. Are you good enough to hunt elephants, deers, bears or even whales in their natural habitats? Come with us and try... you can keep your trophies!
TEXT.Italian: Bored of your monotonous life? Ready for adventures? Safari hunters bring to you the excitement of rediscovering the real man inside you. Are you good enough to hunt elephants, deers, bears or even whales in their natural habitats? Come with us and try... you can keep your trophies!
TEXT.Spanish: Bored of your monotonous life? Ready for adventures? Safari hunters bring to you the excitement of rediscovering the real man inside you. Are you good enough to hunt elephants, deers, bears or even whales in their natural habitats? Come with us and try... you can keep your trophies!

TEXT.English: Your local guide will take you hunting, whatever you desire... except the most dangerous game of all... Man.
TEXT.French: Your local guide will take you hunting, whatever you desire... except the most dangerous game of all... Man.

TEXT.Spanish: Your local guide will take you hunting, whatever you desire... except the most dangerous game of all... Man.

TEXT.English: Build this corporation in order to get hunting bonuses.
